#summary how to use pysage

=API Reference=
==Class ObjectManager==
  * *register_object(instance, name[, groupname])*
    Registers a listener with the manager, subscribing to necessary message types
    groupname is optional.  Use groupname is you want to put the instance into a specific group besides the main group.
  * *add_group(name, max_tick_time=None, interval=.03, minimum_sleep=.001)*
    Registers with the manager a group.  Objects in a group can only operate on a seperate thread currently.
